price: 彼らはそこに、いかなる庇護者も援助者も見出すことなく、永遠に留まる。
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
